member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.SendGrid.SendGridConfiguration
member.summary: Defines the configuration options for the SendGrid binding.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.SendGrid.SendGridConfiguration.ApiKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the SendGrid ApiKey. If not explicitly set, the value will be defaulted to the value specified via the 'AzureWebJobsSendGridApiKey' app setting or the 'AzureWebJobsSendGridApiKey' environment variable.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.SendGrid.SendGridConfiguration.ToAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the default "to" address that will be used for messages. This value can be overridden by job functions.
member.remarks: An example of when it would be useful to provide a default value for 'to' would be for emailing your own admin account to notify you when particular jobs are executed. In this case, job functions can specify minimal info in their bindings, for example just a Subject and Text body.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.SendGrid.SendGridConfiguration.FromAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the default "from" address that will be used for messages. This value can be overridden by job functions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.SendGridJobHostConfigurationExtensions.UseSendGrid(Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.JobHostConfiguration,Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.SendGrid.SendGridConfiguration)
member.summary: Enables use of the SendGrid extensions

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.SendGridAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to bind a parameter to a SendGridMessage that will automatically be sent when the function completes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.SendGridAttribute.ApiKey
member.summary: Optional. A string value indicating the app setting to use as the SendGrid API key, if different than the one specified in the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.SendGridAttribute.To
member.summary: Gets or sets the message "To" field. May include binding parameters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.SendGridAttribute.From
member.summary: Gets or sets the message "From" field. May include binding parameters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.SendGridAttribute.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets the message "Subject" field. May include binding parameters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.SendGridAttribute.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the message "Text" field. May include binding parameters.
